/* package codechef; // don't place package name! */

import java.util.*;
import java.lang.*;
import java.io.*;

/* Name of the class has to be "Main" only if the class is public. */
class Codechef
{
	public static void main (String[] args) throws java.lang.Exception
	{
		Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
		int n=Integer.parseInt(sc.nextLine()),moves=0,i=0,count=0,sum=0;
		while(n!=0)
		{
		    count++;
		    String[] inp = (sc.nextLine()).split(" ");
		    int[] a = new int[n];
		    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		    {
		        a[i]=(new Integer(inp[i]));
		        sum+=a[i];
		    }
		    sum=sum/n;
		    for(int temp : a)
		    {
		        if(temp!=sum)
		        moves=moves+(int)Math.abs(temp-sum);
		    }
		    System.out.println("Set #"+count+"\nThe minimum number of moves is "+moves/2+".\n");
		    moves=0;
		    sum=0;
		    n=Integer.parseInt(sc.nextLine());
		}
	}
}
